name: netbird
description: NetBird is a self-hosted WireGuard-based mesh VPN solution that simplifies secure networking across devices. It features identity-based access controls and a web UI for managing peers and networks.
features: WireGuard-based VPN: Fast, secure mesh networking using modern WireGuard protocol for peer-to-peer connections.
Zero-config setup: Automatic peer discovery and connection without manual WireGuard configuration.
Identity-based access: Integrate with SSO providers like Okta, Auth0, or Google for user authentication.
Network policies: Define access rules and segmentation to control which peers can communicate.
Cross-platform clients: Native apps for Linux, Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android devices.
NAT traversal: Connect devices behind firewalls and NAT without port forwarding or public IPs.
Web management UI: Configure networks, manage peers, and view connection status from a browser.
Activity monitoring: Track peer connections, data transfer, and network events in real-time.
Automatic routing: Dynamic route management ensures traffic flows through the optimal path.
Self-hosted control: Run your own management server for complete data sovereignty and privacy.
Group management: Organize peers into groups for simplified policy application and access control.
API access: Automate network management and integrate with existing infrastructure via REST API.
